data.name: Medieval Kingdom Wars Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The soundtrack for Medieval Kingdom Wars captures the drama, danger, and diplomacy of the Hundred Years' War across seventeen tracks. Composer Joel Steudler summons the spirit of the era through period-appropriate instruments mixed with powerful orchestral punch. Crumhorns, recorders, and the Viola da Gamba (played by Isabel Esain) evoke the sound of ancient times when kings and knights shaped the world. Melodic themes and thundering drums will carry you into an action packed listening experience!

---

TRACKLIST

Medieval Kingdom Wars - 4:00
Feudal Lords - 2:05
Oath Of Fealty - 2:13
Height Of Chivalry - 2:04
Vassal Kings - 2:06
The Greater Share Of Honour - 2:03
Succession Rights - 2:33
Coronation - 2:06
Church And State - 4:04
Tenuous Treaties - 1:04
Royal Authority - 2:08
Bellum Eleison - 1:27
Broken Lance - 2:04
Fickle Allegiance - 4:04
We Happy Few - 2:12
It Shall Be Remember'd - 3:47
Hundred Years' War - 4:23

data.short_description: The soundtrack for Medieval Kingdom Wars captures the drama, danger, and diplomacy of the Hundred Years' War across seventeen tracks. Composer Joel Steudler summons the spirit of the era through period-appropriate instruments (featuring Isabel Esain playing Viola da Gamba) mixed with powerful orchestral punch.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, German, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 500MHz Pentium III
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Video Card or Better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Video Card or Better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit Sound Card
